articles.title: Asian Games 2023: Sunil Chhetri, Gurpreet Singh Sandhu, Sandesh Jhingan's names not in squad - Khel Now
articles.description: Names of Sunil Chhetri, Gurpreet Singh Sandhu and Sandesh Jhingan have not been sent for the Asian Games. AIFF President has intervened.
articles.content: Sunil Chhetri, Gurpreet Singh Sandhu, and Sandesh Jhingan, the prominent leaders of Indian football, have been notably absent from the official list of athletes representing the country in the upcomi… [+2703 chars]
